snippet: The Promontory Financial Group is facing scrutiny in Congress. | Herbalife finds itself in the middle of an insider trading scandal. | Life Technologies appears poised to be at the center of a bidding contest. | Europe’s competition commissioner...
abstract: The Promontory Financial Group is facing scrutiny in Congress. | Herbalife finds itself in the middle of an insider trading scandal. | Life Technologies appears poised to be at the center of a bidding contest. | Europe’s competition commissioner sometimes communicates with companies using text messages.
